name: dreamt i was walking on a path
name_original: dreamt i was walking on a path
description:
played with mouse only. click on the paths to unfold last night's dream. can you reach the three different endings?

made in the span of about ~30 hours, over the last two days of the 55th godot wild jam. the jam's theme was dreams and the wildcards used were a fork in the road and kaboom!.

this very bare-bones  project was a learning experience and an attempt at generating a rudimentary narrative based on a player's choices.

it's quite likely that you'll encounter some glitches, bugs and ghosts, but i still hope you'll enjoy it!
